subtitle: Roads, maintenance, and essential services that keep Hart County moving.

about.title: What Public Works Does
about.text:
This department is a combination of two branches that manage all the County’s infrastructure, including: construction projects, solid waste, environmental enforcement, planning, land subdivision and road construction.

             Public Works manages all County Roads, Engineering, Capital Projects (Construction projects), Solid Waste, Public Buildings and County Vehicle Maintenance.
